name: Artificial (itch) (xarvus, Doc. Steel, TheRisingSun)
description:
Please play in fullscreen for full experience!

You are a survivor of the long-dreaded bloody AI revolution - but you are not alone!

You battle through the factory floors, slaying robots that stand in your way and saving workers trapped in the machine. You are there to end this bloodshed - going straight for the heart!

This project was made for the Brackeys Game Jam August 2022 by Doc Steel,  TheRisingSun and Xarvus. The theme was "You are not alone". This game captures this theme within the overrarching story of being granted a weapon enchantment and by saving the lives of terrified workers and scientists.
